goodbye: Mun gode da amfani, sai an jima!

about_content: Kayan aikin sauke sautin ASMR mai sauƙi da inganci
- Saukewa ta hanyoyi da yawa, tare da tallafin ci gaba daga inda aka tsaya
- Tsarin sake gwadawa mai basira, yana magance matsalolin intanet kai tsaye
- Nuna ci gaban aiki nan take
- Tabbatar da girman fayil, tsallake abubuwan da aka riga aka sauke kai tsaye
